cwitools.coordinates.get_pxarea_arcsec¶

cwitools.coordinates.get_pxarea_arcsec(header)¶

Get the pixel area in arcsec2.

Parameters

header – Header for 3D or 2D data.

Returns

size of the spaxels in arcseconds squared.

Return type

float
